column5: Following Bowslayer's lead with another float suit "heads up". Just ordered a Mustang Integrity Atlantic Class suit for the better half at the great price of $99.99.  They only have them in gold and X-small, but, a killer price for a great suit.  http://www.gear-up.com/cart_showproduct.php?pid=19465
Thanks! Just got one. Hope it fits her(!?)
Wow what a great deal!  That suit would fit one of my legs LOL! Wish they had larger sizes.
I hear you, Mike!  Definitely not my first colour choice, but, for that price...who cares.
